main event: Two round, party-like objects flying about two hands apart, changing colors rapidly and leaving behind clouds.
interesting points: The objects changed colors from blue-green to green to yellow to orange., The sighting lasted between 45 to 60 seconds., The observer was described as reliable and interested in astronomical observation., The weather during the sighting was clear with few scattered clouds., A possible explanation suggested the objects could be F-84 Crusader jet fighters.
witness description: reliable individual interested in astronomical observation
